query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  COUNT(net_profit) as records_with_profit,
  ROUND(COUNT(net_profit) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as profit_coverage_pct,
  ROUND(AVG(net_profit), 2) as avg_profit,
  ROUND(MIN(net_profit), 2) as min_profit,
  ROUND(MAX(net_profit), 2) as max_profit
FROM time_series;
